name: SAI DHANUSH SOMA
summary: Aspiring Software Engineer with 1.5 years of software development experience, skilled in building scalable solutions and optimizing performance. Passionate about problem-solving, agile methodologies, scalability and system design. Seeking to leverage software development expertise to deliver impactful solutions.

experience.title: Software Developer
description: Built full-stack fitness and gym platform using MERN stack with OTP-based authentication using Twilio.
Created real-time booking system with MongoDB Atlas and interactive recommendation engine.
Designed and optimized REST APIs, enhanced UI/UX using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
Followed Agile practices and collaborated with developers and designers.
Capgemini-assessed final year project with formal evaluation.

experience.title: Research Intern
description: Built dashboard using Prometheus and Grafana with Python.
Worked on blockchain and IoT efficiency with 95% uptime and 20% boost.

projects.name: SmartNest
description: Built smart home product management app using Java Servlets for backend and ReactJS frontend.
Integrated AI recommendations with LangChain + GPT-4o-mini.
Used MySQL, MongoDB, Docker, Elasticsearch, RAG-based search and semantic embeddings.
Role-based authentication and message queue integration.

projects.name: Cuisine Connect
description: Built AI chatbot to streamline food ordering and provide recommendations.
Used OpenAI + LangChain agents for refund, defect, and fraud handling.

projects.name: GIF ENIGMA
description: Interactive GIF-based guessing game with 100+ puzzles and score tracking.
Creator Mode and Reddit sharing enabled through Gemini AI.

projects.name: Fit Pulse
description: MERN-stack gym booking site with OTP login and real-time reservations.
Spatial indexing in MongoDB enabled geo-discovery with 100 km range.

projects.name: My Well
description: Designed UI for React Native app integrating health wearables for seniors.
Backend with Node.js, MongoDB, Redis, AWS and AI health analytics.

projects.name: Portfolio
description: Full-stack serverless portfolio with resume-driven chatbot Q&A using LangChain + OpenAI.
CI/CD pipeline deployment via Vercel and Render with semantic embedding search.
